User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Allow all crawlers to access all content
# This is optimal for a blog/content website

# Sitemap locations for different locales
Sitemap: https://techoxium.com/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://techoxium.com/sitemap-0.xml

# Optional: Crawl delay (uncomment if needed)
# Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin areas if any
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_astro/
